'use strict';

  value: true
});
 
var _models = require('../models');
 
var _models2 = _interopRequireDefault(_models);
 
function _interopRequireDefault(obj) { return obj && obj.__esModule ? obj : { default: obj }; }
 
require('dotenv').config();
var cloudinary = require('cloudinary');
 
cloudinary.config({
  cloud_name: process.env.CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME,
  api_key: process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_KEY,
  api_secret: process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET

/**
 * createCenters - crates a new center
 *
 * @param {object} req
 * @param {object} res
 *
 * @return {object} (message, center)
 */
var createCenters = function createCenters(req, res) {
  req.checkBody('name', 'name is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('capacity', 'capacity is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('location', 'location is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('facilities', 'facilities is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('type', 'center type is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('price', 'price type is required').notEmpty();
  req.sanitize('name').trim();
  req.sanitize('facilities').trim();
 
  var errors = [];
  var imagePath = req.file ? req.file.path : 'server/sample.jpg';
  var imageName = void 0;
  var imageUrl = void 0;
  var center = {
    name: req.body.name,
    capacity: req.body.capacity,
    location: req.body.location,
    facilities: req.body.facilities,
    type: req.body.type,
    price: req.body.price,
    imageName: req.body.imageName,
    imageUrl: req.body.imageurl
  };
  req.getValidationResult().then(function (result) {
    if (!result.isEmpty()) {
      errors = result.array().map(function (e) {
        return e.msg;
      });
      return res.status(400).json({
        message: errors
      });
    }
    return _models2.default.Center.findOne({
      where: {
        name: req.body.name
      }
    }).then(function (data) {
      Eif (data) {
        return res.status(409).json({
          message: 'Center name already exist'
        });
      }
      return _models2.default.Center.create(center).then(function (c) {
        if (c) {
          return res.status(201).json({
            message: 'New center has been created succefully',
            data: c
          });
        }
      });
    });
  });
};

var getAllCenters = function getAllCenters(req, res) {
  _models2.default.Center.findAll().then(function (centers) {
    Eif (centers) {
      return res.status(200).json({
        data: centers
      });
    }
    return res.status(404).json({
      message: 'No center found in the database, Create a new center'
    });
  });
};
 
/**
 * getCenterPerPage - implementation of pagination
 *
 * @param {object} req
 * @param {object} res
 *
 * @return {object} (centers)
 */
 
var getCenterPerPage = function getCenterPerPage(req, res) {
  var limit = 5;
  var offset = 0;
  _models2.default.Center.findAndCountAll().then(function (data) {
    var page = req.params.page;
 
    var isNum = isNaN(req.params.page); //eslint-disable-line
    page = parseInt(page, 10);
    var pages = Math.ceil(data.count / limit);
    if (page <= 0 || !Number.isInteger(page) || isNum) {
      return res.status(400).json({
        message: 'Invalid page number, should start with 1'
      });
    }
    offset = limit * (page - 1);
    _models2.default.Center.findAll({
      limit: limit,
      offset: offset,
      order: [['id', 'ASC']]
    }).then(function (centers) {
      res.status(200).json({
        data: centers,
        count: data.count,
        pages: pages
      });
    });
  }).catch(function (err) {
    return res.status(500).send('Interval server error');
  });
};
 
var deleteCenter = function deleteCenter(req, res) {
  req.checkParams('id', 'Center Id is required').notEmpty();
  var errors = [];
  req.getValidationResult().then(function (result) {
    if (!result.isEmpty()) {
      errors = result.array().map(function (e) {
        return e.msg;
      });
      res.status(400).json({
        message: errors
      });
    } else {
      return _models2.default.Center.destroy({
        where: {
          id: parseInt(req.params.id, 10)
        }
      }).then(function (center) {
        if (center >= 1) {
          return _models2.default.Event.destroy({
            where: {
              centerId: parseInt(req.params.id, 10)
            }
          }).then(function (event) {
            if (event >= 0) {
              return res.status(200).json({
                message: 'Center is successfully deleted'
              });
            }
          });
        }
        return res.status(404).json({
          message: 'Center with id: ' + req.params.id + ' is not found'
        });
      });
    }
  });
};

var updateCenter = function updateCenter(req, res) {

    return res.json({
      message: 'Please provide a center Id'
    });
  }
  var imagePath = req.file ? req.file.path : 'server/sample.jpg';
  var center = {
    id: parseInt(req.params.id, 10),
    name: req.body.name,
    capacity: req.body.capacity,
    location: req.body.location,
    facilities: req.body.facilities,
    type: req.body.type,
    price: req.body.price,
    imageName: req.body.imageName,
    imageUrl: req.body.imageUrl
  };
 
  return _models2.default.Center.update(center, {
    where: {
      id: center.id
    }
  }).then(function (c) {
    if (c[0] === 1) {
      console.log(JSON.stringify(c));
      return res.status(201).json({
        message: 'Center with ID ' + req.params.id + ' is sucessfully updated',
        data: c
      });
    }
    return res.status(404).json({
      message: 'Center with Id: ' + req.params.id + ' is not found'
    });
  });
};

var getCenterById = function getCenterById(req, res) {
  req.checkParams('id', 'Id parameter is required').notEmpty();
  var errors = [];
  req.getValidationResult().then(function (result) {
    Iif (!result.isEmpty()) {
      errors = result.array().map(function (e) {
        return e.msg;
      });
      return res.status(400).json({
        message: errors
      });
    }
    return _models2.default.Center.findById(parseInt(req.params.id, 10)).then(function (center) {
      Eif (center) {
        return res.status(200).json({
          message: 'Center found',
          data: center
        });
      }
      return res.status(404).json({
        message: 'Center not found in the database'

    });
  });
};
 
/**
 * getCentersEvents - Gets events for a particular center
 *
 * @param {object} req
 * @param {object} res
 *
 * @return {object} (message, error, center)
 */
var getCentersEvents = function getCentersEvents(req, res) {
  return _models2.default.Center.findById(req.params.id, {
    include: [{
      model: _models2.default.Event
    }]
  }).then(function (centersEvents) {
    if (centersEvents) {
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Successfully found a center',
        error: false,
        data: centersEvents
      });
    }
    return res.status(404).json({
      message: 'No center found',
      error: true,
      data: null
    });
  });
};
 
var centersControllers = {
  createCenters: createCenters,
  getAllCenters: getAllCenters,
  deleteCenter: deleteCenter,
  updateCenter: updateCenter,
  getCenterById: getCenterById,
  getCentersEvents: getCentersEvents,
  getCenterPerPage: getCenterPerPage
};
 
exports.default = centersControllers;
